settings.main_paragraph:
Have you found a home plan that’s almost perfect, but it just needs a few tweaks to be absolutely perfect? If so, the Garrell Associates design team is here to help.

We can help with such minor things as foundation changes, garage orientations to more extensive width or depth changes, even full custom design changes.

With over 20+ years of experience designing and modifying homes you can trust our experience will be able to guide you in the process of designing your dream home.

Begin by printing the floor plan. Take an ink pen and draw your requests directly. Make a corresponding list explaining your requests. Make sure your desired foundation type is specified. Orientation of the home needed (As shown or reversed). Once complete, submit or email us the marked up floor plan and we will provide a quotation for the modifications.

settings.process_heading_01: Print out & Mark up the brochure with your desired modification
settings.process_para_01: You will receive your quote by email 4-5 business days after our office receives your requested customization.
settings.process_heading_02: Submit the marked brochure to Garrell Associates
settings.process_para_02: You will receive your quote by email 4-5 business days after our office receives your requested customization.

settings.customize_Content: In ordre to receive your free modification quote, please fill out the from below. Be as detailed and descriptive as possible.
